name: BSO
comment:
>>37805869

> [[ 81 ]]

You see an opportunity, and take it, diving low and sliding on your knees. You lean back, passing under the Pegasus's front legs, and slash at it from beneath. Rather than glance off, your blade bites into the monster's stone body, which has an unsettling fleshy quality to it. It's a solid hit, and you move even faster to avoid getting trampled by the hind legs, pressing low to the ground.

Its hooves are inches off your face, when you note the red glow rising off your body. Haste.

Tatsumaki is running towards you, coming from the way the Pegasus just left. Vision and Ayla are on either side of the room. You don't see where Nel went.

> Unfortunate. Keep moving; you'll have to double back.
> Can't waste this opportunity. Grab on.
> Call for the explosive.
> Other.
